Article.title: Gunfire near apartments, businesses leads to 3 arrests
Article.Description: LEAGUE CITY — Police said three men were “irresponsibly” firing guns toward an apartment complex and several businesses Monday morning.
Article.MainBody: Oleander blanket covering isle now Is it a shrub or small tree? There is a plant common to Galveston that can behave as either, as varieties of the oleander (Nerium oleander) can range in height from four feet to over 20. These hardy plants that make Galveston the Oleander City are blooming now and will provide a blanket of color for months.

Article.title: Arizona man injured in Kemah motorcycle accident

Article.title: Police searching for shooter in Sandpiper Cove shooting

Article.title: Burst water pipe helps prevent damage during house fire
Article.Description: GALVESTON — A burst water pipe and quick emergency phone calls prevented a fire from doing considerably more damage to a Galveston home, fire officials said.
